summary: Create Fiat Withdrawal To Whitelisted Fiat Account
description:
Creates a fiat withdrawal from a specified counterparty, requiring its connection ID from /v1/api/counterparty/connection/all.
Note #1: Only transactions with "OTC" type counterparties are supported.
Note #2: Before submitting a withdrawal request, ensure the destination fiat account is whitelisted. Whitelisting is exclusively performed through the Parfin Platform UI.

pathParameters.name: connection_id
pathParameters.description: This path parameter, a string in UUID format, serves to identify the specific connection relevant to the current operation.

queryParameters.name: counterparty_type
queryParameters.description: Specifies the type of a particular connection -- "OTC" -- relevant to the current operation.

fields.name: connection_id
fields.description: This path parameter, a string in UUID format, serves to identify the specific connection relevant to the current operation.

description: Retrieves all currencies enabled for Fiat withdrawal at a specific connection (counterparty).

pathParameters.name: connection_id
pathParameters.description: This path parameter, a string in UUID format, serves to identify the specific connection relevant to the current operation.

queryParameters.name: counterparty_type
queryParameters.description: Specifies the type of a particular connection -- "OTC" -- relevant to the current operation.

description: Creates a withdraw transaction at a specific connection (counterparty).

pathParameters.name: connection_id
pathParameters.description: This path parameter, a string in UUID format, serves to identify the specific connection relevant to the current operation.

queryParameters.name: counterparty_type
queryParameters.description: Specifies the type of a particular connection -- "EXCHANGE", "CUSTODY", "OTC", or "BANK" -- relevant to the current operation.

fields.name: connection_id
fields.description: This path parameter, a string in UUID format, serves to identify the specific connection relevant to the current operation.

description: Retrieves all currencies enabled for withdrawal at a specific connection (counterparty).

pathParameters.name: connection_id
pathParameters.description: This path parameter, a string in UUID format, serves to identify the specific connection relevant to the current operation.

queryParameters.name: network_type_list
queryParameters.description: This query parameter specifies the blockchains relevant to the current operation. It filters the currencies based on their associated blockchains. For example, by passing "Ethereum Mainnet" for this field, the endpoint will return all currencies that run on the Ethereum Mainnet network and are enabled for withdrawal for the specified counterparty connection.

queryParameters.name: counterparty_type
queryParameters.description: Specifies the type of a particular connection -- "EXCHANGE", "CUSTODY", "OTC", or "BANK" -- relevant to the current operation.

description: Retrieves all whitelisted addresses enabled for withdrawal at a specific connection (counterparty).

pathParameters.name: connection_id
pathParameters.description: This path parameter, a string in UUID format, serves to identify the specific connection relevant to the current operation.

queryParameters.name: currency
queryParameters.description: Specifies the currency to be withdrawal.

queryParameters.name: network
queryParameters.description: Specifies the network to be withdrawal.

description: Retrieves a list of Fiat Accounts that are whitelisted. Fiat withdrawal transactions are permitted only to accounts on this list or to connected counterparties.

Retrieves comprehensive details about a specific fiat withdrawal transaction, using its unique identifier. It serves as a tool for monitoring the progress and specifics of each withdrawal, including the transaction amount, currency involved, and the destination account.

pathParameters.name: id
pathParameters.description: Unique identifier for a fiat withdrawal transaction. It is a Parfin transaction ID that is returned when a withdrawal is created.

description: Retrieves comprehensive details about a specific withdrawal transaction, using its unique identifier. It serves as a tool for monitoring the progress and specifics of each withdrawal, including the transaction amount, currency involved, and the recipient's address.

pathParameters.name: id
pathParameters.description: Unique identifier for a withdrawal transaction. It is a Parfin transaction ID that is returned when a withdrawal is created.
